document.full_text: plainclothes gunmen killed 10 people and wounded dozens more in yemen's capital wednesday when they opened fire on protesters demanding the immediate ouster of the president, whom gulf arab mediators want to ease from power.
document.title: gunmen kill 10 in yemen anti-government protests
lines_and_colors: plainclothes gunmen killed 10 people and wounded dozens more in yemen's capital wednesday when they opened fire on protesters demanding the immediate ouster of the president, whom gulf arab mediators want to ease from power.
